lines.text: When you're young, not much matters. When you find something that you care about, then that's all you got. When you go to sleep at night you dream of pussy. When you wake up it's the same thing. It's there in your face. You can't escape it. Sometimes when you're young the only place to go is inside. That's just it - fucking is what I love. Take that away from me and I really got nothing.
[singing, drunk in a bathtub]
I'm Casper, the friendly ghost / The DOPEST ghost in town / All the bitches love me 'cause I'm fuckin' CASPER / The DOPEST ghost around.

[last words]
Jesus Christ, what happened?
What if you can't make yourself happy?
Then I don't know. You know what you do then you forget, you block it out... If you want to be happy don't think... if you stutter don't talk.
I think if we fuck, you would love it!
Jennie, you've tested positive for the HIV virus.
What?
The test isn't one hundred percent accurate. You should...
I tested positive?
I'm sorry.
But I only had sex with Telly.
[the nurse is silent]
I just got tested to keep Ruby company.
But like, if you deflower a girl man, man, you're the man. No one can ever do that again. You're the only one. No one, no one, has the power to do that again.

Right. The way I see it. My outlook on the situation. It's like getting fame, you know what I'm saying? Say you was to die tomorrow right, fifty years from now all the virgins you ever fucked are gonna remember you. Right? They gonna tell their grandkids about that shit.
How did she smell? Did her puss stink?
Take a whiff.
[Telly holds up his fingers and Casper smells them]
Mmmmm. Butterscotch, yo. That's the best.
Now get in my way, BITCH!
I have no legs. I have no legs. I have no legs. I have no legs. God bless you. I have no legs...
Virgins. I love 'em. No diseases, no loose as a goose pussy, no skank. No nothin. Just pure pleasure.
You look like the prom queen. I dated the prom queen when I was your age. She was the first girl I stuck my tongue in.
Don't you know tricks are for kids?
I'm not gonna die.
So this is your new girl, huh?
I hope so. For now.
You like 'em kinda young, right? Babies?
I like 'em new. Not like you.
That girl was 12, you hit that shit up?
Who am I? I'm the motha-fuckin virgin surgeon.
You got any money?
Three pennies and a ball o' lint, kiiiddd.
I'm askin' you one last time. Do you got "dis-tick"?
What are you saying, "dis-tick"?
He said this dick, motherfucker!
Condoms don't work. They either break, or they slip off, or they make your dick shrink. Nah, but you still gotta use em, yo. At least I did once.
